text: Gruffudd ab Adda (fl. mid 14th century) was a Welsh language poet and musician. Gruffudd was a contemporary of Dafydd ap Gwilym, whose death he mourned in elegy. ==See also== * Gruffudd ab Adda at Wikisource Category:Medieval Welsh poets Category:Welsh-language poets Category:14th- century Welsh poets Category:14th-century Welsh people
title: Gruffudd ab Adda
